summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the Corporation Counsel to appear and defend on behalf of the defendants J. Warren, Chief of Police, P.F. Keefe, a police sergeant, and D.M. Schoonover, a police officer, in an action brought by C. Russel under Cause No. 140659 in the Superior Court of the State of Washington for King County, providing for the payment of costs in said action, and declaring an emergency.
